MAN.VI.summary: Josef Manner & Comp. AG manufactures and sells chocolates. It offers wafers, biscuits, sponge fingers, and gingerbreads. The company provides its products under the Manner, Casali, Napoli, Ildefonso, Dragee Keksi, winak, and Victor Schmidt brands through outlet stores, Manner shops, Manner stores, and an online shop. It exports its products to approximately 50 European and non-European countries. The company was founded in 1890 and is headquartered in Vienna, Austria.
